title: Whereas His Majesty out of his princely care for securing the true Protestant religion, and to satisfie the minds of all his loving subjects therein, for the more effectual discovery and suppression of the most horrid and execrable popish plot ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1677-1685 : Ormonde)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Took and John Crook ... and are to be sold by Mary Crook ...,
